description: A look at what stories are trending across the West of England on Tuesday 25 February.
title: Headlines: new swimming pool plans and stunt pilot views
title_page: Headlines: new swimming pool plans and stunt pilot views - BBC News
maintext:
Gloucestershire Live has a behind-the-scenes look, external at a new M&S in Cheltenham, with the store's bosses promising "surprises" on opening day.
And a bid to open a community-owned swimming pool in Minehead has secured a Â£6,000 funding boost, according to the Somerset Leveller, external. The town's last swimming pool closed in 2006.
Bristol Live has reported on revised plans to demolish a block of shops on Filwood Broadway, external in south Bristol, with new shops and flats planned for the site.
Bristol City's Yu Hirakawa has made a permanent move to the club, and lots of fans are delighted with the news., external
A nine-year-old from Swindon has learned all about recycling after she wrote a letter to the council, external saying soft plastics were difficult to recycle.
People also had a lot to say about Gloucestershire County Council consulting on new plans for cycle paths through Gloucester., external
Finally, the team from the Royal International Air Tattoo has posted some impressive footage showing what the pilots of stunt planes see, external when they're flying through the air.
